title: How to Make Good French Toast Without Maple Syrup

steps.headline: Heat up your pan and add cooking spray liberally.
Crack the egg into a bowl.
Add about twice the amount of egg in milk.
steps.description: Pour some vanilla in, and a tiny bit of cinnamon.

steps.headline: Dip one piece of bread in the bowl of mix.
Place the bread on the pan.
Add a small glob of butter onto the bread and then sprinkle some cinnamon.
Flip the bread and repeat the butter and cinnamon.
Flip the bread once again after about 45 seconds.
steps.description: They are done when both sides are dark brown. Repeat the cooking process for as many slices as you like.

steps.headline: Sprinkle a lot of powdered sugar onto the French Toast and enjoy!

text: Heat up your pan and add cooking spray liberally.  Crack the egg into a bowl.  Add about twice the amount of egg in milk. Pour some vanilla in, and a tiny bit of cinnamon. Stir well.  Dip one piece of bread in the bowl of mix.  Place the bread on the pan.  Add a small glob of butter onto the bread and then sprinkle some cinnamon.  Flip the bread and repeat the butter and cinnamon.  Flip the bread once again after about 45 seconds. They are done when both sides are dark brown. Repeat the cooking process for as many slices as you like. Sprinkle a lot of powdered sugar onto the French Toast and enjoy! (Or see "Mock Maple Syrup" under "Tips" below!)
